name: A total waste of money
description:
A not so funny RPG-Maker game.

The goal of the game is to spend money on something absolutely useless.

Warning! The game might feature some words of german language. (But it is mainly english.)

2nd Warning! All profits will not be donated, but will be self-serving!

Xbox360 Controller Support!

As a spezial extra you will get a free picture of geometrical forms!
